name: Create Update File
info:
Creates an Excel (XLSX) file using the supplied configuration. No data needed from msg.
Inputs:
 - Sheet Configuration: Array of JSON objects representing sheets 
    {
        sheetDf: Global Context location containing the DataForge Dataframe that will populate the sheet,
        columns: Array of columns names. Must match the column names in the sheetDf,
        sheetName: The name of the sheet
    }
 - File Name: The name of the file to be saved. ex "My File". Do NOT include file extension
Outputs:
    This function does not change any the msg object at all.

name: Create list of all stored files. Create files folder if it doesn't exist
Set Configuration
Save Sheet to Global Context
Load Configuration
Create XLSX

rules.v: ENOENT: no such file or directory

name: Check Valid URL
Set 404
Display Files
format:
<template>
    <v-list>
        <v-list-header>Files</v-list-header>

        <v-divider></v-divider>

        <v-list-item v-for="(file, i) in msg.files" 
            v-bind:href="'/files/' + file" 
            :key="i" 
            :value="file" 
            color="primary" 
            variant="plain"
        >
            <template v-slot:prepend>
                <v-icon icon="mdi-file-document"></v-icon>
            </template>

            <v-list-item-title v-text="file"></v-list-item-title>
        </v-list-item>
    </v-list>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        data() {
            // define variables available component-wide
            // (in <template> and component functions)
            return {
                items: [
                    { text: 'Real-Time', icon: 'mdi-clock' },
                    { text: 'Audience', icon: 'mdi-account' },
                    { text: 'Conversions', icon: 'mdi-flag' },
                ]
            }
        }
    }
</script>

name: Prep for Storage
NHI Stock Levels
query:
SELECT 
	SBM.ITEMNMBR as product_code
--	,SBM.LOCNCODE
	,SBM.BIN as location_name
	,SBM.QUANTITY as quantity
--	,SBM.QTYTYPE
--	,SBM.*
--	,IM.*
 
FROM NHI..IV00112 AS SBM	--SITE BIN MASTER
	LEFT JOIN NHI..IV00101 AS IM ON IM.ITEMNMBR = SBM.ITEMNMBR	--ITEM MASTER
 
WHERE 1=1
	AND IM.ITEMTYPE <> 2	--NO DISCONTINUED ITEMS
	AND SBM.QTYTYPE = 1		--ONLY 'ON HAND' QTY TYPE
	AND SBM.LOCNCODE = 'NHI'	--ONLY ITEMS IN NHI LOCATION
	AND SBM.QUANTITY <> 0	-- NON-ZERO BIN QTY
	AND SBM.BIN NOT IN ('QC HOLD','RTS' )	--EXCLUDE BINS IF NEEDED

name: Create XLSX
Trim Whitespace
